Reviews.Title: “Very good value for money”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel 26 euro night single cheap berlin single shared bathroom luxurious clean lot light clean bathroom didnt notice shared staff helpful free breakfast bread cerals jam nutella coffee juice etc satisfying 20 ubahn easy center handy convenient arrive home night uhlandstrasse street shops restaurants etc value money negative hmm maybe couldnt elevator didnt cant believe negative reviews wouldnt
